p: COVID-19 may augment complications in individuals with diabetes through an imbalance in ACE2 activation pathways leading to an inflammatory response and β-cell dysfunction in the pancreas, which may deteriorate COVID-19 complications including vasculopathy, coagulopathy and psychological stress [ 49]. The chronic low grade inflammation in diabetes and obesity can also lead to an enhanced ‘cytokine storm’ in COVID-19 patients [ 50].
